alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 3:21PM CDT until April 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Significantly reduced visibility from heavy snow rates and hazardous road conditions will make travel difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday and Friday commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With ongoing flooding and water filled ditches, it is possible vehicles may slide off the road into very cold water. There remains a notable degree of uncertainty in snow amounts and associated impacts. Areas within the advisory may be upgraded to a warning with little to no lead time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
